claim_evidence: learning both tasks jointly actually leads to better results than learning
evidence: We show that learning both tasks jointly actually leads to better results than learning either task with gold standard data from the other task provided .
text: We show that learning both tasks jointly actually leads to better results than learning either task with gold standard data from the other task provided .

claim_evidence: the tasks of POS induction and morphological segmentation are dependentit learn only segmentationsthe results in fully unsupervised setting are better
evidence: We found some evidence that the tasks of POS induction and morphological segmentation are dependent by conducting semisupervised experiments where we gave the model gold standard tags and segmentations in turn and let it learn only segmentations or tags respectively and found that the results in fully unsupervised setting are better .
text: We found some evidence that the tasks of POS induction and morphological segmentation are dependent by conducting semisupervised experiments where we gave the model gold standard tags and segmentations in turn and let it learn only segmentations or tags respectively and found that the results in fully unsupervised setting are better .

evidence: We tested the model on many languages and showed that by introcing a likelihood scaling heuristic it produces state-of-the-art POS induction results .
text: We tested the model on many languages and showed that by introcing a likelihood scaling heuristic it produces state-of-the-art POS induction results .

claim_evidence: One way to improve the segmentation results could be to use segment bigrams instead of unigrams
evidence: One way to improve the segmentation results could be to use segment bigrams instead of unigrams .
text: One way to improve the segmentation results could be to use segment bigrams instead of unigrams .

claim_evidence: the model produces state-of-the-art results on POS induction
evidence: The evaluation on multilingual data shows that the model produces state-of-the-art results on POS induction .
text: The evaluation on multilingual data shows that the model produces state-of-the-art results on POS induction .

evidence: Despite of that , the model failed to learn as good segmentations as the state-of-the-art morphological segmentation model Morfessor .
text: Despite of that , the model failed to learn as good segmentations as the state-of-the-art morphological segmentation model Morfessor .

evidence: In this paper we presented a joint unsupervised model for learning POS tags and morphological segmentations with hierarchical Dirichlet Process model .
text: In this paper we presented a joint unsupervised model for learning POS tags and morphological segmentations with hierarchical Dirichlet Process model .

claim_evidence: the tagging results could further be improved by adding additional features concerning punctuationleft out in the current model for enabling to test the concept of joint modelling of two dependent tasks
evidence: We believe that the tagging results could further be improved by adding additional features concerning punctuation , capitalization etc. which are heavily used in the other state-of-the-art POS induction systems but these features were intentionally left out in the current model for enabling to test the concept of joint modelling of two dependent tasks .
text: We believe that the tagging results could further be improved by adding additional features concerning punctuation , capitalization etc. which are heavily used in the other state-of-the-art POS induction systems but these features were intentionally left out in the current model for enabling to test the concept of joint modelling of two dependent tasks .
